body.p: When working on vim scripts, eclim provides two commands for finding user defined functions.

ul.li: :FindFunctionDef [function] - Finds the definition of the supplied function name or for the function under the cursor.
:FindFunctionRef [function] - Finds references of the supplied function name or the function under the cursor.

g:EclimVimFindSingleResult
Determines what action to take when a only a single result is found.
Possible values include:
'split' - open the result in a new window via "split".
'edit' - open the result in the current window.
'lopen' - open the location list to display the result.
